title: Strengthening Instructional Design Competencies Through Genre Analysis in Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Core mathematical theories and general pedagogical concepts
context.additional_context: A genre-based instructional design process for pre-service teachers to learn how to apply it in mobile environments for mathematics education settings

learning_goals: They can explain the four main stages and 14 detailed implementation strategies by analyzing the mathematics education genre model
It can propose a design plan for flexibly applying mathematical education genres tailored to actual classroom contexts
It can complete a genre analysis project based on educational materials collected in mobile learning environments

resources: Genre Analysis Template for Mathematics Education
Translated Case Study Materials from Chilean Classrooms

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
